div.p: This prototype website is under development and subject to change. There are bugs but also the chance to suggest new features. You might also like to help me develop and test the editor, for which you will need a username and password. All comments and requests to the webmaster. Some background to the project is in my blog
The photos used are only a temporary selection pending submission of club photos.
div.div:
This site uses the following technology:
eXist XML Database
XQuery and JavaScript languages
XML for data formating
jQuery Javascript extension
Google Map API
Bitfolk VPS
